title.text: RFC 3166:  Request to Move RFC 1403 to Historic Status

contents.text:
Network Working Group                                           D. Meyer
Request for Comments: 3166                                        Sprint
Category: Informational                                       J. Scudder
                                                           Cisco Systems
                                                             August 2001
Request to Move RFC 1403 to Historic Status
contents.zh-CHS: 请求将RFC 1403移动到历史状态

contents.text: Status of this Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录的状况

contents.text: This memo provides information for the Internet community. It does not specify an Internet standard of any kind. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录为互联网社区提供信息。它没有规定任何类型的互联网标准。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: Copyright Notice
contents.zh-CHS: 版权公告

contents.text: Copyright (C) The Internet Society (2001). All Rights Reserved.
contents.zh-CHS: 版权所有（C）互联网协会（2001年）。版权所有。

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: RFC 1403, "BGP OSPF Interaction", describes technology which is no longer used. This document requests that RFC 1403 be moved to Historic status.
contents.zh-CHS: RFC 1403，“BGP OSPF交互”描述了不再使用的技术。本文件要求将RFC 1403移至历史状态。

contents.text: 1. Details
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 细节

contents.text: During a review of internet standards relating to BGP, it became apparent that BGP OSPF interaction, as described in RFC 1403, is not common usage (if at all), and requires significant implementation complexity. Since this mechanism has not been in use in the public internet for many years (if ever), it is proposed to reclassify it to Historic.
contents.zh-CHS: 在审查与BGP相关的互联网标准时，很明显，RFC 1403中描述的BGP OSPF交互不是常见用法（如果有的话），并且需要大量的实现复杂性。由于该机制已多年没有在公共互联网上使用（如果有），因此建议将其重新分类为历史性的。

contents.text: 2. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 安全考虑

contents.text: Moving RFC 1403 to Historic has no known effect on the security of the internet.
contents.zh-CHS: 将RFC 1403移动到Historical对internet的安全性没有已知的影响。

contents.text: 3. References
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 工具书类

contents.text: [RFC1403] Varadhan, K., "BGP OSPF Interaction", RFC 1403, January 1993.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC1403]Varadhan，K.，“BGP-OSPF相互作用”，RFC 1403，1993年1月。
